## Block.setValid() method

Mark the field valid

**Signature:**

```typescript
setValid(field: string, flag: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to mark as valid or invalid. |
|  flag | boolean | A boolean flag indicating whether to mark the field as valid or invalid. |

**Returns:**

void
